prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies the power of molten lava and ancient minerals.
Generate a legendary creature with a rocky exterior and glowing orange accents.
Imagine a formidable fire-type Pokemon that resembles a volcano with arms.
Design a unique Pokemon that combines elements of metal and fiery magma.
Show me a powerful Pokemon that thrives in volcanic environments and has a rugged look.
Make a Pokemon that is reminiscent of a molten rock creature with fierce eyes.
Give me a fiery beast with a sturdy build and a penchant for battles.
